name: Toilet Paper Collector
description:
Please don't judge me for this...

I made this project as a joke for the Completely Wrong Game Jam. It was a fun opportunity to make something bad just for the sake of making something bad, so I decided to throw this monstrosity together. I apologize in advance to anyone who plays.  

All you need to do is collect toilet paper and not go offscreen "Features" include:
  • Randomly changing controls
  • Awful sound effects and music
  • An incredibly buggy boss fight
    • Hits rarely register
    •  Contains new sound effects and music
    • Serves no purpose in progressing
    • Tends to break the game on completion
    • "It basically doesn't work"
  • Ultimately useless goal
  • No progression
Why did I make this?
